entry.name: Best Play Stats
entry.comment:
Play stats are modified to the best possible play stats. - Coins: 9M - Wins: 9M - Losses: 0 - VR: 99K - BR: 99K - Drifts: 9M - Mini-Turbos: 9M - Super Mini-Turbos: 9M - Jump Boosts: 9M - Balloons Popped: 9M - Own Balloons Popped: 0
Online [X] Offline [X]
- Enter and finish a race for a permanent save. - This code is fully stable.
---
Source: https://github.com/Mewtality/TCPGecko-MK8-Cheat-Codes
Is Raw Machine Code [O] Is Assembly RAM Writes [X]

entry.name: Blue Shell Ride
entry.comment:
When throwing a blue shell, the player will follow it until it reaches its destination. While being in first place, this code will not activate.

- This only applies to the player with a Wii U Gamepad. - This code may cause some unintended behavior.

entry.name: Bullet Bill Killer

<Left Stick Button> Enable

entry.name: Gravity Modifier
entry.comment:
Modifies the gravity. To change gravity strength, modify the value at line 2.
